plugin.label: crossoverDist
plugin.name: Crossover distortion
plugin.p: This is a simulation of the distortion that happens in class B and AB power amps when the signal crosses 0.
For class B simulations the smooth value should be set to about 0.3 +/- 0.2 and for AB it should be set to near 1.0.

port.label: amp
port.name: Crossover amplitude
port.p: Controls the point at which the output signal becomes linear.

port.label: smooth
port.name: Smoothing
port.p: Controls degree of smoothing of the crossover point.
